sentences.en: A turkey vulture spreads its wings in one of California's deserts.
sentences.cn: 一只土耳其秃鹫在一处加州沙漠里张开翅膀.

sentences.en: A: There are some things that would gag even a vulture.
sentences.cn: 答: 有些东西就连秃鹰吃了也会噎着.

sentences.en: Fall while fighting me, and you'll be vulture meat!
sentences.cn: 下来跟我打吧, 你将变成我秃鹰嘴里的肉!

sentences.en: He hadn’t been dead five minutes before those vultures from the media were after his widow.
sentences.cn: 他尸骨未寒，媒体那帮家伙就对他的遗孀进行了围追堵截。

sentences.en: Indeed , one species, the slender - billed vulture , numbers a mere 400.
sentences.cn: 有一种嘴细长的兀鹫现仅存活四百只.

sentences.en: That vulture is capable of doing anything.
sentences.cn: 那个贪得无厌的人什么事都能干得出来.

sentences.en: The Turkey Vulture could scent up to 10 miles.
sentences.cn: 土耳其秃鹫,能够闻到10英里以外的气味.

sentences.en: The vulture extended his scrawny neck.
There are some things that would gag even a vulture.
sentences.cn: 有些东西就连秃鹰吃了也会噎着.

sentences.en: This product becomes by a Laos red acid vulture.
sentences.cn: 该产品由老挝红酸枝精雕而成.

sentences.en: This product becomes by the red sandalwood lump fine vulture.
sentences.cn: 本产品由紫檀瘤精雕而成.

sentences.en: Was G ---- a vulture after all?
sentences.cn: G.究竟是不是雄鹰 呢 ?

sentences.en: We saw a vulture gorging on some rotting carcase.
sentences.cn: 我们看见一只秃鹫正在贪婪地啄食腐尸.

sentences.en: Why does the vulture always hover in the sky here?
sentences.cn: 这只老雕为什么总在这上空盘旋 呢 ?

sentences.en: Yes, he looks like a real vulture.
sentences.cn: 听说了, 他看起来像是个剥削者.

words.tran_cn: 秃鹫似的；贪婪的；掠夺成性的
贪婪的；兀鹰的；兀鹰般的

trans.tran_cn: 秃鹰，秃鹫，贪婪的人，劫掠者
trans.tran_en: a large bird that eats dead animals
